title: Josh Rod Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Josh Rod? Check out all of Josh Rod's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogJosh Rod Senior Solution Marketing Manager, Similarweb Josh Rod Josh Rod is the senior marketing manager for Similarweb's offerings to the SaaS industry. He has a background in developing and executing marketing strategies in leading Israeli SaaS companies and believes in incorporating humour and wit into marketing. Josh is from South Africa and spelled "humour" in the previous sentence correctly.
